text: Ani tumhi tya avastha'ance smarana kara jevha (allahane) tumhala ada (janasamuha) nantara khalipha banavile ani ya dharatita tumhala rahanyaci jaga dili. Tumhi samatala jaminivara ghare banavita ani parvatanna koruna ghara banavita, tevha allahacya krpa denagyance smarana kara ani dharatita phasada (utpata) majavita phiru naka
